items.sentence: The door will lock automatically when you go out.
I can't think of any reason we shouldn't do that.
I've only got one week left before school starts.
These dresses were designed by the same designer.
A language isn't something you learn all at once.
When I opened my eyes, I saw Tom leaning over me.
It doesn't seem to matter all that much, does it?
I often buy clothes at the store where Tom works.
It'll take about three hours to get there by car.
It took me three hours to drive here from Boston.
